text: It's Not Easy Being a Bunny is a children's book written by Marilyn Sadler and illustrated by Roger Bollen. It is about a young bunny named P.J. Funnybunny and his adventures to live with a different animal because he does not like being a bunny. Category:Children's fiction books Category:1983 children's books Category:American picture books
title: It's Not Easy Being a Bunny
